title: Tactical Style Font?
content: I'm looking for a font that is military/police/tactical "looking" for an identity, I've found a few I like but most go the "M\*A\*S\*H" route or collegiate block style, anything else anyone knows of?
author: 2graphica

comments.content: What about a grotesque? Somehow I can see [Bureau Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415224642/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/BureauGrotesque) working well here. But for something black and stocky, what about [Champion Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415224642/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/champion/index.html) from H&FJ?

Geoff, those are a little different from where I was headed but thanks for the idea, I might just keep in mind Champion Gothic for the future I really like it.  
ssi, now there is a family I hadn't thought of and it's almost perfect just still maybe a little cliche, but the client likes that kind of look, I was just trying to show they don't have to be obvious with the typeface.  
I also liked Politica from Storm :http://www.stormtype.com/typefaces-fonts-shop/typeface.php?id=438

[http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry\_gridnik/gridnik\_reg.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415224642/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry_gridnik/gridnik_reg.html "http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/foundry\_gridnik/gridnik\_reg.html")

[http://www.optimo.ch/pages/departement/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415224642/http:/www.optimo.ch/pages/departement/index.php "http://www.optimo.ch/pages/departement/index.php")

Look at Politics on the Optimo site, though it doesn't have much of a family. Gridnik can work well for text.  
Tim

Check also Mário Feliciano's [Mandrax](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415224642/http:/www.vllg.com/Feliciano/B-Sides/mudTyper+Weights/) and [Big](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415224642/http:/www.vllg.com/Feliciano/Morgan/mudTyper+Weights/) of the Morgan Project.
How about Rumbsvelte or Rice about as military and distasteful as they get.
Thanks for the help guys, I ended up buying the whole United set from House, I actually have been getting more work from these type of companies so hopefully this collection will be a good addition.
Great choice Miguel, good luck with the identity.
